page.title: 09WINSTON FACILITIES cont.
page.content: Winston, though small, is not without its problems. The proposal for a drift mine, west of the village, has caused concern. Houses built on Highcliff Edge, have an elevated position and are subjected to the prevailing westerly winds. The fears of dust and noise from the drift mine has caused some people to consider selling and moving away, despite assurances that the landscaping will prevent annoyance. The mobile library comes round once a fortnight and will obtain any special book one may require.
